title: Baba's Busy Day
hook: One sunny morning, Baba woke up excited to help her family. But will she finish all her chores in time?
moral: Even small tasks can be important and helpful.
paragraphs: One sunny morning, Baba woke up with a big smile on her face. She wanted to help her family with the chores around the house. "I will be a big helper today!" she shouted happily.

Baba's first task was to feed the chickens in the backyard. As she sprinkled the grains, she noticed that the hen had laid a special blue egg. Curious, Baba gently picked it up and showed it to her family.

Next, Baba helped her mommy water the colorful flowers in the garden. But uh-oh, she accidentally spilled some water on her shoes. "Oopsie daisy!" Baba chuckled as she tried to dry them under the sun.

As the sun started to set, Baba realized she still had one more task left – to gather firewood for the night. She ran to the woods and collected as much wood as she could carry. "I did it!" she exclaimed proudly.
Baba's family was so grateful for all her help. They thanked her for being such a wonderful helper. Baba beamed with joy, knowing that even the smallest tasks can make a big difference.

en-pt.title: Baba teve um Dia Agitado
en-pt.moral: Até as tarefas pequenas podem ser importantes e ajudar.
en-pt.hook: Certa manhã ensolarada, Baba acordou animada para ajudar sua família. Mas será que ela vai conseguir terminar todas as tarefas a tempo?
paragraphs:
Certo dia ensolarado, Baba acordou com um sorriso enorme no rosto. Ela queria ajudar sua família com as tarefas da casa. "Hoje serei uma grande ajudante!" ela gritou felizmente.
A primeira tarefa da Baba foi alimentar as galinhas no quintal. Enquanto ela espalhava os grãos, notou que a galinha tinha posto um ovo azul especial. Curiosa, Baba o pegou delicadamente e mostrou para sua família.
Depois, Baba ajudou a mamãe a regar as flores coloridas no jardim. Mas, ops, ela derramou acidentalmente um pouco de água nos sapatos. "Que bagunça!" Baba riu enquanto tentava secá-los ao sol.
Quando o sol começou a se pôr, Baba percebeu que ainda tinha uma última tarefa - coletar lenha para a noite. Ela correu para a floresta e coletou o máximo de madeira que conseguia carregar. "Consegui!" ela exclamou orgulhosa.
A família da Baba ficou muito agradecida por toda a ajuda dela. Eles agradeceram por ela ser uma ajudante maravilhosa. A Baba brilhava de alegria, sabendo que até as tarefas mais pequenas podem fazer uma grande diferença.

id-en.hook: One sunny morning, Baba woke up excited to help her family. But will she finish all her chores in time?
id-en.moral: Even small tasks can be important and helpful.
id-en.title: Baba's Busy Day
paragraphs:
One sunny morning, Baba woke up with a big smile on her face. She wanted to help her family with the chores around the house. "I will be a big helper today!" she shouted happily.
Mama's first job was to give food to the chickens in the garden. When she spread the tiny seeds, she saw that the hen had laid a unique blue egg. Interested, Mama softly picked it and displayed it to her loved ones.
Later, Baba aided her mummy in giving water to the pretty flowers in the garden. Oh dear, she spilled some water on her shoes by mistake. "Whoopsie daisy!" Baba giggled while she attempted to dry them under the sunshine.
When the big ball of light in the sky started to go sleepy, Baba remembered she had one more thing to do – get sticks for the night's fire. She raced to the woods, picked up lots of sticks, and carried them home. "I did it!" she shouted happily.
Baba's family were very happy because of all the help she gave. They said thank you for being such a great helper. Baba smiled a lot, feeling really happy, knowing that even tiny jobs can be very important.

en-fr.moral: Même les toutes petites choses peuvent être importantes et utiles.
en-fr.title: La Journée Bien Occupée de Baba
en-fr.hook: Un matin ensoleillé, Baba s'est réveillée toute excitée pour aider sa famille. Mais va-t-elle finir toutes ses tâches à temps ?
paragraphs:
Un matin ensoleillé, Baba s'est réveillée avec un grand sourire sur son visage. Elle voulait aider sa famille avec les tâches autour de la maison. "Je serai un grand aide aujourd'hui!" a-t-elle crié joyeusement.
Baba a eu pour première tâche de nourrir les poules dans le jardin. En dispersant les grains, elle a remarqué que la poule avait pondu un œuf bleu spécial. Curieuse, Baba l'a doucement ramassé et l'a montré à sa famille.
Ensuite, Baba a aidé sa maman à arroser les fleurs colorées dans le jardin. Mais oh là là, elle a renversé accidentellement de l'eau sur ses chaussures. "Oh là là!" a rigolé Baba en essayant de les sécher sous le soleil.
Alors que le soleil commençait à se coucher, Baba réalisa qu'il lui restait une tâche à accomplir - ramasser du bois pour la nuit. Elle courut vers la forêt et ramassa autant de bois qu'elle pouvait porter. "Je l'ai fait !", s'exclama-t-elle fièrement.
La famille de Baba était tellement reconnaissante pour toute son aide. Ils la remerciaient d'être une si merveilleuse assistante. Baba rayonnait de joie, sachant que même les tâches les plus petites peuvent faire une grande différence.

en-de.hook: An einem sonnigen Morgen wachte Baba auf und war aufgeregt, ihrer Familie zu helfen. Wird sie alle ihre Aufgaben rechtzeitig zu Ende bringen?
en-de.title: Babas Vielbeschäftigter Tag
en-de.moral: Auch kleine Aufgaben können wichtig und hilfreich sein.
paragraphs:
An einem sonnigen Morgen wachte Baba mit einem großen Lächeln im Gesicht auf. Sie wollte ihrer Familie bei den Aufgaben im Haus helfen. "Ich werde heute ein großer Helfer sein!" rief sie fröhlich.
Mama hat Babas erste Aufgabe gegeben, die Hühner im Hinterhof zu füttern. Als sie das Korn streute, bemerkte sie, dass die Henne ein besonderes blaues Ei gelegt hatte. Neugierig hob Baba es sanft auf und zeigte es ihrer Familie.
Dann half Baba ihrer Mama, die bunten Blumen im Garten zu gießen. Aber oh-oh, sie verschüttete aus Versehen etwas Wasser auf ihre Schuhe. "Hoppla Daisi!" lachte Baba, als sie versuchte, sie unter der Sonne zu trocknen.
Als die Sonne anfing zu untergehen, merkte Baba, dass sie noch eine Aufgabe übrig hatte - Holz sammeln für die Nacht. Sie rannte in den Wald und sammelte so viel Holz, wie sie tragen konnte. "Ich hab's geschafft!" rief sie stolz.
Baba's Familie war so dankbar für all ihre Hilfe. Sie bedankten sich bei ihr, dass sie eine so wunderbare Helferin war. Baba strahlte vor Freude, wissend, dass selbst die kleinste Aufgabe einen großen Unterschied machen kann.
